013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016
017import java.util.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
020import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
021
022/**
023 * Holds a set of reusable objects for different aspects of the OAS.
024 *
025 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
026 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../index.html#jrs.OpenApi">Overview &gt; juneau-rest-server &gt; OpenAPI</a>
027 * </ul>
028 */
029@Bean(properties="schemas,responses,parameters,examples,requestBodies,headers,securitySchemes,links,callbacks,*")
030@FluentSetters
031public class Components extends OpenApiElement {
032
033   private Map<String,SchemaInfo> schemas;
034   private Map<String,Response> responses;
035   private Map<String,Parameter> parameters;
036   private Map<String,Example> examples;
037   private Map<String,RequestBodyInfo> requestBodies;
038   private Map<String,HeaderInfo> headers;
039   private Map<String,SecuritySchemeInfo> securitySchemes;
040   private Map<String,Link> links;
041   private Map<String,Callback> callbacks;
042
043   /**
044    * Default constructor.
045    */
046   public Components() {}
047
048   /**
049    * Copy constructor.
050    *
051    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
052    */
053   public Components(Components copyFrom) {
054      super(copyFrom);
055      this.schemas = copyOf(copyFrom.schemas);
056      this.responses = copyOf(copyFrom.responses);
057      this.parameters = copyOf(copyFrom.parameters);
058      this.examples = copyOf(copyFrom.examples);
059      this.requestBodies = copyOf(copyFrom.requestBodies);
060      this.headers = copyOf(copyFrom.headers);
061      this.securitySchemes = copyOf(copyFrom.securitySchemes);
062      this.links = copyOf(copyFrom.links);
063      this.callbacks = copyOf(copyFrom.callbacks);
064   }
065
066   /**
067    * Returns the schemas map.
068    *
069    * @return The schemas map.
070    */
071   public Map<String,SchemaInfo> getSchemas() {
072      return schemas;
073   }
074
075   /**
076    * Sets the schemas map.
077    *
078    * @param value The new value for this property.
079    * @return This object.
080    */
081   public Components setSchemas(Map<String,SchemaInfo> value) {
082      this.schemas = value;
083      return this;
084   }
085
086   /**
087    * Returns the responses map.
088    *
089    * @return The responses map.
090    */
091   public Map<String,Response> getResponses() {
092      return responses;
093   }
094
095   /**
096    * Sets the responses map.
097    *
098    * @param value The new value for this property.
099    * @return This object.
100    */
101   public Components setResponses(Map<String,Response> value) {
102      this.responses = value;
103      return this;
104   }
105
106   /**
107    * Returns the parameters map.
108    *
109    * @return The parameters map.
110    */
111   public Map<String,Parameter> getParameters() {
112      return parameters;
113   }
114
115   /**
116    * Sets the parameters map.
117    *
118    * @param value The new value for this property.
119    * @return This object.
120    */
121   public Components setParameters(Map<String,Parameter> value) {
122      this.parameters = value;
123      return this;
124   }
125
126   /**
127    * Returns the examples map.
128    *
129    * @return The examples map.
130    */
131   public Map<String,Example> getExamples() {
132      return examples;
133   }
134
135   /**
136    * Sets the examples map.
137    *
138    * @param value The new value for this property.
139    * @return This object.
140    */
141   public Components setExamples(Map<String,Example> value) {
142      this.examples = value;
143      return this;
144   }
145
146   /**
147    * Returns the request bodies map.
148    *
149    * @return The request bodies map.
150    */
151   public Map<String,RequestBodyInfo> getRequestBodies() {
152      return requestBodies;
153   }
154
155   /**
156    * Sets the request bodies map.
157    *
158    * @param value The new value for this property.
159    * @return This object.
160    */
161   public Components setRequestBodies(Map<String,RequestBodyInfo> value) {
162      this.requestBodies = value;
163      return this;
164   }
165
166   /**
167    * Returns the headers map.
168    *
169    * @return The headers map.
170    */
171   public Map<String,HeaderInfo> getHeaders() {
172      return headers;
173   }
174
175   /**
176    * Sets the headers map.
177    *
178    * @param value The new value for this property.
179    * @return This object.
180    */
181   public Components setHeaders(Map<String,HeaderInfo> value) {
182      this.headers = value;
183      return this;
184   }
185
186   /**
187    * Returns the security schemes map.
188    *
189    * @return The security schemes map.
190    */
191   public Map<String,SecuritySchemeInfo> getSecuritySchemes() {
192      return securitySchemes;
193   }
194
195   /**
196    * Sets the security schemes map.
197    *
198    * @param value The new value for this property.
199    * @return This object.
200    */
201   public Components setSecuritySchemes(Map<String,SecuritySchemeInfo> value) {
202      this.securitySchemes = value;
203      return this;
204   }
205
206   /**
207    * Returns the links map.
208    *
209    * @return The links map.
210    */
211   public Map<String,Link> getLinks() {
212      return links;
213   }
214
215   /**
216    * Sets the links map.
217    *
218    * @param value The new value for this property.
219    * @return This object.
220    */
221   public Components setLinks(Map<String,Link> value) {
222      this.links = value;
223      return this;
224   }
225
226   /**
227    * Returns the callbacks map.
228    *
229    * @return The callbacks map.
230    */
231   public Map<String,Callback> getCallbacks() {
232      return callbacks;
233   }
234
235   /**
236    * Sets the callbacks map.
237    *
238    * @param value The new value for this property.
239    * @return This object.
240    */
241   public Components setCallbacks(Map<String,Callback> value) {
242      this.callbacks = value;
243      return this;
244   }
245}
